This class provides utility functions for files.

bool FileUtils::LockFile ( const char *  fileName  )  [static]

Locks a file for exclusive use. This is a soft locking mechanism. The actual file is not locked, instead it uses a "LCK" file to determine the lock status.

Parameters:
fileName The name of the file to lock.
Returns:
True if the file was successfully locked.

bool FileUtils::UnlockFile ( const char *  fileName  )  [static]

Unlocks a file for exclusive use. This is a soft locking mechanism. The actual file is not locked, instead it uses a "LCK" file to determine the lock status.

Parameters:
fileName The name of the file to unlock.
Returns:
True if the file was successfully unlocked.
